column6: Please create a new account or use a pre-existing one, account doesn't need to own the game; or else you will get the dreaded "ERROR! Failed to install app '215360' (No subscription)"

column6: Supported on Debian and derivatives (including Ubuntu) only. First enable i386 with `dpkg --add-architecture i386` if running on amd64, then `apt install libc6:i386 zlib1g:i386 libssl1.1:i386 libstdc++6:i386`.
